title: 10 Minute Romantic Shrimp
directions: Before making sauce, start the pasta boiling. Once it starts,heat oil and garlic over low heat. Try to keep it from browning excessively.
When the pasta is almost al dente, throw shrimp into pan with oil, and turn heat up. Stir often. When cooked, add salt and pepper. Toss drained pasta with the sauce in the pan and serve.
